title: PND Detox Program | Prairie Naturopathic Doctors
description: Participants of the PND Detox Program have reported Improved sleep Improved digestion Increased energy Improved mood Decreased brain fog Decreased overall toxic load Decreased inflammation Decreased joint pain Improved lipid levels Improved metabolism
cleaned_text: health! PND detox program can eliminate toxins from your body, improve your health, and promote weight loss. Our 21-day detox program includes 3 visits with the Naturopathic Doctor to provide a customized plan and support, 3 detox therapies to activate cleansing, a nutritional plan, and a detox kit. The results: On average, our detox patients see a 50% reduction in toxicity score, weight loss of 4 lbs (with the highest being 12.6 lbs.), fat loss of 4.3 lbs., and symptom improvement of 48% (some have reported 100% improvement) in 3 weeks!
